trans-unit.source: "Fast Apps and Sites with JavaScript"
trans-unit.target: “具有JavaScript的快速应用程序和网站”

trans-unit.source: "SplashMaintainAspectRatio" preference is optional. If set to true, splash screen drawable is not stretched to fit screen, but instead simply "covers" the screen, like CSS "background-size:cover". This is very useful when splash screen images cannot be distorted in any way, for example when they contain scenery or text. This setting works best with images that have large margins (safe areas) that can be safely cropped on screens with different aspect ratios.
trans-unit.target: “ SplashMaintainAspectRatio”首选项是可选的。如果设置为true，则初始屏幕可绘制对象不会拉伸到适合屏幕的大小，而只是简单地“覆盖”屏幕，例如CSS“ background-size：cover”。当初始屏幕图像不能以任何方式失真时，例如当它们包含风景或文本时，这非常有用。此设置最适合具有较大页边距（安全区域）的图像，可以在具有不同宽高比的屏幕上安全地进行裁剪。

trans-unit.source: "SplashScreenSpinnerColor" preference is also optional and is ignored when not set. Setting it to a valid color name or HEX color code will change the color of the spinner on Android 5.0+ devices.
trans-unit.target: “ SplashScreenSpinnerColor”首选项也是可选的，未设置时将被忽略。将其设置为有效的颜色名称或十六进制颜色代码将更改Android 5.0+设备上微调器的颜色。

trans-unit.source: "SplashShowOnlyFirstTime" preference is also optional and defaults to true. When set to true splash screen will only appear on application launch. However, if you plan to use navigator.app.exitApp() to close application and force splash screen appear on next launch, you should set this property to false (this also applies to closing the App with Back button).
trans-unit.target: “ SplashShowOnlyFirstTime”首选项也是可选的，默认为 true 。设置为 true 时,初始屏幕仅在应用程序启动时出现。但是，如果您计划使用 navigator.app.exitApp() 关闭应用程序并在下次启动时强制显示启动屏幕，则应将此属性设置为 false （这也适用于使用“后退”按钮关闭应用程序）。

trans-unit.source: Cordova-ios version 4.0 and greater does not require the cordova-plugin-whitelist plugin to be installed, however its configuration details apply to iOS too. The <allow-intent> and <allow-navigation> tags are new for cordova-ios 4.x and greater, see the cordova-plugin-whitelist documentation for details on the usage of these tags.
trans-unit.target: Cordova-ios 4.0版本和更高也不会要求科尔多瓦-插件白名单中安装插件，但其配置细节适用于iOS的了。该 <allow-intent> 和 <allow-navigation> 标签是新的科尔多瓦-IOS 4.x和更大的，看到科尔多瓦-插件白名单的详细信息的文件上这些标签的使用。

trans-unit.source: activated event might be fired before deviceready so you should save the activation flag and args to the app context in case you need them - for example in the Share target case. The subscription to the activated event should be done before deviceready handler (in app.bindEvents in terms of the Cordova template).
trans-unit.target: activated 事件可能会在设备 deviceready 之前触发，因此您应将激活标志和args保存到应用程序上下文中，以防万一，例如在共享目标的情况下。对 activated 事件的预订应在 deviceready 处理程序之前完成（在Cordova模板的 app.bindEvents 中）。

trans-unit.source: cordova.file.applicationDirectory - Read-only directory where the application is installed. (iOS, Android, BlackBerry 10, OSX, windows)
trans-unit.target: cordova.file.applicationDirectory -安装应用程序的只读目录。（iOS，Android，BlackBerry 10，OSX，Windows）

trans-unit.source: cordova.file.applicationStorageDirectory - Root directory of the application's sandbox; on iOS & windows this location is read-only (but specific subdirectories [like /Documents on iOS or /localState on windows] are read-write). All data contained within is private to the app. (iOS, Android, BlackBerry 10, OSX)
trans-unit.target: cordova.file.applicationStorageDirectory -应用程序沙箱的根目录；在iOS和Windows上，此位置是只读的（但特定的子目录[如iOS上的 /Documents 或 /localState 上的/ localState ]是可读写的）。其中包含的所有数据对应用程序都是私有的。（iOS，Android，BlackBerry 10，OSX）

trans-unit.source: cordova.file.applicationStorageDirectory is read-only; attempting to store files within the root directory will fail. Use one of the other cordova.file.* properties defined for iOS (only applicationDirectory and applicationStorageDirectory are read-only).
trans-unit.target: cordova.file.applicationStorageDirectory 是只读的；尝试在根目录中存储文件将失败。使用为iOS定义的其他 cordova.file.* 属性之一（仅 applicationDirectory 和 applicationStorageDirectory 是只读的）。

trans-unit.source: cordova.file.cacheDirectory - Directory for cached data files or any files that your app can re-create easily. The OS may delete these files when the device runs low on storage, nevertheless, apps should not rely on the OS to delete files in here. (iOS, Android, BlackBerry 10, OSX, windows)
trans-unit.target: cordova.file.cacheDirectory -缓存的数据文件或您的应用程序可以轻松重新创建的任何文件的目录。当设备的存储空间不足时，操作系统可能会删除这些文件，但是，应用程序不应该依赖操作系统来删除此处的文件。 （iOS，Android，BlackBerry 10，OSX，Windows）

trans-unit.source: cordova.file.dataDirectory - Persistent and private data storage within the application's sandbox using internal memory (on Android, if you need to use external memory, use .externalDataDirectory). On iOS, this directory is not synced with iCloud (use .syncedDataDirectory). (iOS, Android, BlackBerry 10, windows)
trans-unit.target: cordova.file.dataDirectory -使用内部内存在应用程序的沙箱中进行持久和私有数据存储（在Android上，如果需要使用外部内存，请使用 .externalDataDirectory ）。在iOS上，此目录未与iCloud同步（使用 .syncedDataDirectory ）。（iOS，Android，BlackBerry 10，Windows）

trans-unit.source: cordova.file.documentsDirectory - Files private to the app, but that are meaningful to other application (e.g. Office files). Note that for OSX this is the user's ~/Documents directory. (iOS, OSX)
trans-unit.target: cordova.file.documentsDirectory -该应用程序专用的文件，但对其他应用程序有意义（例如Office文件）。请注意，对于OSX，这是用户的 ~/Documents 目录。（iOS，OSX）

trans-unit.source: cordova.file.externalApplicationStorageDirectory - Application space on external storage. (Android)
trans-unit.target: cordova.file.externalApplicationStorageDirectory -外部存储上的应用程序空间。（Android的）

trans-unit.source: cordova.file.externalCacheDirectory - Application cache on external storage. (Android)
trans-unit.target: cordova.file.externalCacheDirectory -外部存储上的应用程序缓存。（Android的）

trans-unit.source: cordova.file.externalDataDirectory - Where to put app-specific data files on external storage. (Android)
trans-unit.target: cordova.file.externalDataDirectory -将特定于应用程序的数据文件放在外部存储中的位置。（Android的）

trans-unit.source: cordova.file.externalRootDirectory - External storage (SD card) root. (Android, BlackBerry 10)
trans-unit.target: cordova.file.externalRootDirectory -外部存储（SD卡）根。（Android，BlackBerry 10）

trans-unit.source: cordova.file.sharedDirectory - Files globally available to all applications (BlackBerry 10)

trans-unit.source: cordova.file.syncedDataDirectory - Holds app-specific files that should be synced (e.g. to iCloud). (iOS, windows)

trans-unit.source: messageAsArrayBuffer expects NSData* and converts to an ArrayBuffer in the JavaScript callback. Likewise, any ArrayBuffer the JavaScript sends to a plugin are converted to NSData*.
trans-unit.target: messageAsArrayBuffer 需要 NSData* 并在JavaScript回调中转换为 ArrayBuffer 。同样，JavaScript发送给插件的任何 ArrayBuffer 都将转换为 NSData* 。

trans-unit.source: messageAsMultipart expects an NSArray* containing any of the other supported types, and sends the entire array as the arguments to your JavaScript callback. This way, all of the arguments are serialized or deserialized as necessary, so it is safe to return NSData* as multipart, but not as Array/Dictionary.
trans-unit.target: messageAsMultipart 期望包含任何其他受支持类型的 NSArray* ，并将整个数组作为 arguments 发送到JavaScript回调。这样，所有参数都会根据需要进行序列化或反序列化，因此可以安全地将 NSData* 作为多部分返回，而不是作为 Array / Dictionary 返回。

trans-unit.source: readAsBinaryString function is not stated in the Specs and not supported in IE and does not have a stub.
trans-unit.target: readAsBinaryString 函数未在规范中说明，并且在IE中不受支持，并且没有存根。

trans-unit.source: readAsDataURL function is supported, but the mediatype in Chrome depends on entry name extension, mediatype in IE is always empty (which is the same as text-plain according the specification), the mediatype in Firefox is always application/octet-stream. For example, if the content is abcdefg then Firefox returns data:application/octet-stream;base64,YWJjZGVmZw==, IE returns data:;base64,YWJjZGVmZw==, Chrome returns data:<mediatype depending on extension of entry name>;base64,YWJjZGVmZw==.
trans-unit.target: readAsDataURL 支持readAsDataURL函数，但是Chrome中的媒体类型取决于条目扩展名，IE中的媒体类型始终为空（根据规范，其与 text-plain 相同），Firefox中 application/octet-stream 类型始终为application / octet-stream。例如，如果内容为 abcdefg ,则Firefox返回 data:application/octet-stream;base64,YWJjZGVmZw== ，IE返回 data:;base64,YWJjZGVmZw== ，Chrome返回 data:<mediatype depending on extension of entry name>;base64,YWJjZGVmZw== 。

trans-unit.source: allowEdit is unpredictable on Android and it should not be used! The Android implementation of this plugin tries to find and use an application on the user's device to do image cropping. The plugin has no control over what application the user selects to perform the image cropping and it is very possible that the user could choose an incompatible option and cause the plugin to fail. This sometimes works because most devices come with an application that handles cropping in a way that is compatible with this plugin (Google Plus Photos), but it is unwise to rely on that being the case. If image editing is essential to your application, consider seeking a third party library or plugin that provides its own image editing utility for a more robust solution.
trans-unit.target: allowEdit 在Android上是不可预测的，因此不应使用！此插件的Android实现尝试在用户设备上查找并使用应用程序进行图像裁剪。该插件无法控制用户选择执行图像裁剪的应用程序，并且用户很可能会选择不兼容的选项并导致插件失败。之所以有时行之有效，是因为大多数设备都附带以与该插件兼容的方式处理裁剪的应用程序（Google Plus Photos），但是依靠这种情况是不明智的。如果图像编辑对于您的应用程序至关重要，请考虑寻求第三方库或提供自己的图像编辑实用程序的插件，以提供更强大的解决方案。

trans-unit.source: App on target may not reflect changes to images Once you run the app on a target, iOS caches the launch image. Unfortunately, when you change the image, iOS does not invalidate the cache, which means you'll still see the old launch image. You should either: delete the app, or reset content & settings (simulator).
trans-unit.target: 目标上的应用程序可能无法反映对图像的更改在目标上运行应用程序后，iOS会缓存启动图像。不幸的是，当你改变形象，iOS版也没有缓存失效，这意味着你仍然会看到旧的启动图像。您应该：删除应用程序，或重置内容和设置（模拟器）。

trans-unit.source: Avoiding user surprise: If the app collects or uses information in a way that may be surprising to users in light of the primary purpose of your app (for example, a music player that accesses stored pictures), you should take similar steps as with the collection of sensitive personal information. That is, you should strongly consider the use of just-in-time dialog boxes to inform the user about the collection or use of that information and, if appropriate, provide a corresponding privacy control.
trans-unit.target: 避免用户感到意外：如果应用收集或使用信息的方式可能会导致用户对应用的主要目的感到惊讶（例如，访问所存储图片的音乐播放器），则应采取与收集敏感的个人信息。也就是说，您应该强烈考虑使用“即时”对话框来通知用户有关该信息的收集或使用情况，并在适当时提供相应的隐私控制。

trans-unit.source: CSS Transitions versus DOM Manipulation - Using hardware accelerated CSS transitions will be dramatically better than using JavaScript to create animations. See the list of resources at the end of this section for examples.
trans-unit.target: CSS过渡与DOM操纵 -使用硬件加速的CSS过渡要比使用JavaScript创建动画要好得多。有关示例，请参见本节末尾的资源列表。

trans-unit.source: CameraUsesGeolocation (boolean, defaults to false). For capturing JPEGs, set to true to get geolocation data in the EXIF header. This will trigger a request for geolocation permissions if set to true.
trans-unit.target: CameraUsesGeolocation（布尔值，默认为false）。为了捕获JPEG，将其设置为true可在EXIF标头中获取地理位置数据。如果设置为true，这将触发对地理定位权限的请求。

trans-unit.source: Click versus Touch - Many devices impose a 300ms delay on click events in order to distinguish between a tap and tap-to-zoom gesture. This can have the effect of making your app feel slow and unresponsive. Avoiding this delay is one of the most important ways of improving your app's perceived performance. For more information on the tap delay, see 300ms tap delay, gone away on the Google Developer site.
trans-unit.target: 点击与触摸 -许多设备在点击事件上施加300ms的延迟，以区分点击和点击缩放的手势。这可能会使您的应用程序感觉缓慢且无响应。避免这种延迟是提高应用程序感知性能的最重要方法之一。有关抽头延迟的更多信息，请参阅300ms抽头延迟，该延迟已在Google Developer网站上消失。

trans-unit.source: Collection limitation and security: Your users entrust your app with their information and they expect that you will take appropriate security precautions to protect it. One of the best ways to avoid security compromises of personal information is not to collect the information in the first place unless your app has a specific and legitimate business reason for the collection. For information that does need to be collected, ensure that you provide appropriate security controls to protect that information, whether it is stored on the device or on your backend servers. You should also develop an appropriate data retention policy that is implemented within the app and on your backend servers.
trans-unit.target: 收集限制和安全性：您的用户将其信息委托给您的应用程序，他们希望您会采取适当的安全预防措施来保护它。避免个人信息安全受到威胁的最好方法之一是，首先不要收集信息，除非您的应用有特定且合法的收集理由。对于确实需要收集的信息，请确保您提供了适当的安全控制以保护该信息，无论该信息存储在设备上还是在后端服务器上。您还应该制定适当的数据保留策略，该策略在应用程序内部和后端服务器上实施。

trans-unit.source: Collection of sensitive information: An app's collection of sensitive personal information raises important privacy concerns. Examples of sensitive personal information include financial information, health information, and information from or about children. It also includes information gathered from certain sensors and databases typically found on mobile devices and tablets, such as geolocation information, contacts/phonebook, microphone/camera, and stored pictures/videos. See the following documentation pages for more information: camera, capture, contacts, and geolocation. Generally, you should obtain a user's express permission before collecting sensitive information and, if possible, provide a control mechanism that allows a user to easily change permissions. App operating systems can help in some instances by presenting just-in-time dialog boxes that ask for the user's permission before collection. In these cases, be sure to take advantage of any opportunity to customize the dialog box text to clarify how the app uses and, if applicable, shares such information.
trans-unit.target: 敏感信息的收集：应用程序对敏感个人信息的收集引发了重要的隐私问题。敏感的个人信息的示例包括财务信息，健康信息以及来自儿童或有关儿童的信息。它还包括从某些通常在移动设备和平板电脑上找到的传感器和数据库中收集的信息，例如地理位置信息，联系人/电话簿，麦克风/相机和存储的图片/视频。有关更多信息，请参见以下文档页面：摄像头，捕获，联系人和地理位置。通常，您应在收集敏感信息之前获得用户的明确许可，并在可能的情况下提供一种允许用户轻松更改许可的控制机制。在某些情况下，App操作系统可以通过显示实时对话框来帮助您，该对话框在收集之前要求用户的许可。在这种情况下，请务必利用任何机会自定义对话框文本，以阐明应用程序的使用方式，并在适用时共享此类信息。

trans-unit.source: Cordova 6.1.0 added support for specifying the Cordova-related dependencies of a plugin as part of the plugin's package.json file. Plugins may list the dependencies for multiple releases to provide guidance to the Cordova CLI when it is selecting the version of a plugin to fetch from npm. The CLI will choose the latest release of a plugin that is compatible with the local project's installed platforms and plugins as well as the the local Cordova CLI version. If no releases of the plugin are compatible, the CLI will warn the user about the failed requirements and fall back to the old behavior of fetching the latest release.
trans-unit.target: Cordova 6.1.0添加了对指定插件的Cordova相关依赖项的支持，作为插件的 package.json 文件的一部分。插件可能会列出多个发行版的依赖关系，以在Cordova CLI选择要从npm获取的插件版本时向其提供指导。 CLI将选择与本地项目的已安装平台和插件以及本地Cordova CLI版本兼容的最新版本的插件。如果没有兼容的插件版本，则CLI会警告用户有关失败的要求，并退回获取最新版本的旧行为。

trans-unit.source: Cross-platform (CLI) workflow: Use this workflow if you want your app to run on as many different mobile operating systems as possible, with little need for platform-specific development. This workflow centers around the cordova CLI. The CLI is a high-level tool that allows you to build projects for many platforms at once, abstracting away much of the functionality of lower-level shell scripts. The CLI copies a common set of web assets into subdirectories for each mobile platform, makes any necessary configuration changes for each, runs build scripts to generate application binaries. The CLI also provides a common interface to apply plugins to your app. To get started follow the steps in the Create your first app guide. Unless you have a need for the platform-centered workflow, the cross-platform workflow is recommended.
trans-unit.target: 跨平台（CLI）工作流程：如果您希望您的应用程序在尽可能多的不同移动操作系统上运行，而无需特定平台开发，则可以使用此工作流程。此工作流程围绕 cordova CLI进行。 CLI是一种高级工具，可让您一次为多个平台构建项目，从而抽象出许多低级Shell脚本的功能。 CLI将一组通用的Web资产复制到每个移动平台的子目录中，并对每个移动平台进行任何必要的配置更改，运行构建脚本以生成应用程序二进制文件。 CLI还提供了一个通用接口，可将插件应用于您的应用程序。首先，请按照创建您的第一个应用程序中的步骤进行操作指南。除非您需要以平台为中心的工作流，否则建议使用跨平台工作流。

trans-unit.source: Deprecation Warnings: When an application programming interface (API) is changed or replaced by another API, it is marked as deprecated. The API still works in the near term, but is eventually removed. Some of these deprecated interfaces are reflected in Apache Cordova, and Xcode issues warnings about them when you build and deploy an application.
trans-unit.target: 弃用警告：当应用程序编程接口（API）更改或被另一个API替换时，它被标记为弃用。该API仍会在短期内正常工作，但最终会被删除。这些不推荐使用的界面中的一些反映在Apache Cordova中，当您构建和部署应用程序时，Xcode会发出有关它们的警告。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: Consult the Overview for advice on how to use Cordova's command-line tools or the SDK in your workflow. The Cordova CLI relies on cross-platform source code that routinely overwrites the platform-specific files used by the SDK. If you want to use the SDK to modify the project, use the lower-level shell tools as an alternative to the CLI.
trans-unit.target: 注意：有关在工作流程中如何使用Cordova的命令行工具或SDK的建议，请参阅概述。Cordova CLI依赖跨平台的源代码，该源代码通常会覆盖SDK使用的特定于平台的文件。如果要使用SDK修改项目，请使用较低级别的Shell工具作为CLI的替代方法。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: If your project is not working as expected in the Simulator, please take a note of any errors in the console log in Xcode for clues.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果您的项目无法在Simulator中正常运行，请记下Xcode控制台日志中的任何错误以获取线索。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: In 2.2.0, the bin/create script copy in the CordovaLib sub-project into your project. To have the same kind of setup, just copy in the right CordovaLib into your project directory, and update the CordovaLib sub-project location (relative to the project) in the Xcode File Inspector.
trans-unit.target: 注意：在2.2.0中，将 CordovaLib 子项目中的 bin/create 脚本副本复制到您的项目中。要进行相同的设置，只需将右侧的 CordovaLib 复制到您的项目目录中，然后在Xcode File Inspector中更新 CordovaLib 子项目的位置（相对于项目）。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: Once you switch from the CLI-based workflow to one centered around the platform-specific SDKs and shell tools, you can't go back. The CLI maintains a common set of cross-platform source code, which on each build it uses to write over platform-specific source code. To preserve any modifications you make to the platform-specific assets, you need to switch to the platform-centered shell tools, which ignore the cross-platform source code, and instead relies on the platform-specific source code.
trans-unit.target: 注意：从基于CLI的工作流切换到围绕特定于平台的SDK和Shell工具的工作流后，您将无法返回。 CLI维护一组通用的跨平台源代码，该代码在每次构建时都用于覆盖特定平台的源代码。要保留您对特定于平台的资产所做的任何修改，您需要切换到以平台为中心的外壳工具，该工具会忽略跨平台的源代码，而是依赖于特定于平台的源代码。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: Photo resolution on newer devices is quite good. Photos selected from the device's gallery are not downscaled to a lower quality, even if a quality parameter is specified. To avoid common memory problems, set Camera.destinationType to FILE_URI rather than DATA_URL.
trans-unit.target: 注意：在较新设备上的照片分辨率非常好。即使指定了 quality 参数，从设备库中选择的照片也不会降低到较低的质量。为避免常见的内存问题，请将 Camera.destinationType 设置为 FILE_URI 而不是 DATA_URL 。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: Starting with Cordova 3.0.0, plugins are not pre-installed, and you need to use the plugman command-line utility to install them yourself. See Using Plugman to Manage Plugins.
trans-unit.target: 注意：从Cordova 3.0.0开始，未预先安装插件，您需要使用 plugman 命令行实用程序自行安装它们。请参阅使用Plugman管理插件。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: The CLI adds plugin code as appropriate for each platform. If you want to develop with lower-level shell tools or platform SDKs as discussed in the Overview, you need to run the Plugman utility to add plugins separately for each platform. (For more information, see Using Plugman to Manage Plugins.)
trans-unit.target: 注意：CLI会添加适用于每个平台的插件代码。如果要使用概述中讨论的低级Shell工具或平台SDK进行开发，则需要运行Plugman实用程序以分别为​​每个平台添加插件。（有关更多信息，请参阅使用Plugman管理插件。）

trans-unit.source: NOTE: The current implementation does not adhere to a W3C specification for media capture, and is provided for convenience only. A future implementation will adhere to the latest W3C specification and may deprecate the current APIs.
trans-unit.target: 注意：当前实现不符合用于媒体捕获的W3C规范，仅出于方便目的而提供。将来的实现将遵循最新的W3C规范，并且可能不赞成使用当前的API。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: When you create a Cordova project it does not have any plugins present. This is the new default behavior. Any plugins you desire, even the core plugins, must be explicitly added.
trans-unit.target: 注意：创建Cordova项目时，它没有任何插件。这是新的默认行为。您需要的所有插件，甚至是核心插件，都必须明确添加。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: Xcode 8 is required. Currently, to submit to the Apple App Store, you should use the latest shipped version of the iOS SDK, which is iOS 10 and this is included only with Xcode 8.
trans-unit.target: 注意：需要Xcode 8。当前，要提交到Apple App Store，您应该使用最新发布的iOS SDK版本，即iOS 10，并且仅包含在Xcode 8中。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: You can skip this step if you don't want to pollute your global npm namespace by installing Plugman globally. If this is the case, then when you create a Cordova project with the shell tools, there will be a node_modules directory inside your project which contains Plugman. Since you did not install globally, you need to invoke node for each Plugman command, for example node ./node_modules/plugman/main.js -version. The rest of this guide assumes you have installed Plugman globally, meaning you can invoke it with just plugman.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果不想通过全局安装Plugman 污染全局 npm 命名空间，则可以跳过此步骤。如果是这种情况，那么当您使用Shell工具创建Cordova项目时，项目内部将包含一个包含Plugman 的 node_modules 目录。由于未全局安装，因此需要为每个Plugman命令调用 node ，例如 node ./node_modules/plugman/main.js -version 。本指南的其余部分假定您已经安装了全球Plugman，这意味着你可以只调用它 plugman 。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: all core APIs have been removed and must be installed as plugins. Please see the Using Plugman to Manage Plugins Guide for details.
trans-unit.target: 注意：所有核心API均已删除，必须作为插件安装。有关详细信息，请参阅《使用Plugman管理插件》指南。

trans-unit.source: Networks Suck - Ok, networks don't always suck, but the latency of mobile networks, even good mobile networks, is far worse than you probably think. A desktop app that slurps down 500 rows of JSON data, every 30 seconds, will be both slower on a mobile device as well as a battery hog. Keep in mind that Cordova apps have multiple ways to persist data in the app (LocalStorage and the file system for example). Cache that data locally and be aware of the amount of data you are sending back and forth. This is an especially important consideration when your application is connected over a cellular network.
trans-unit.target: 网络糟透了-好的，网络并不总是那么糟，但是移动网络（甚至是好的移动网络）的延迟要比您想象的要糟糕得多。一个桌面应用程序每30秒会抽取500行JSON数据，这在移动设备和电池消耗上都会变慢。请记住，Cordova应用程序有多种方法可以将数据持久保存在应用程序中（例如LocalStorage和文件系统）。在本地缓存该数据，并了解来回发送的数据量。当您的应用程序通过蜂窝网络连接时，这是一个特别重要的考虑因素。

The events should work as expected when the app is run on a device/emulator without the debugger attached.

trans-unit.source: OS Properties:
trans-unit.target: 操作系统属性：

trans-unit.source: Platform-centered workflow: Use this workflow if you want to focus on building an app for a single platform and need to be able to modify it at a lower level. You need to use this approach, for example, if you want your app to mix custom native components with web-based Cordova components, as discussed in Embedding WebViews. As a rule of thumb, use this workflow if you need to modify the project within the SDK. This workflow relies on a set of lower-level shell scripts that are tailored for each supported platform, and a separate Plugman utility that allows you to apply plugins. While you can use this workflow to build cross-platform apps, it is generally more difficult because the lack of a higher-level tool means separate build cycles and plugin modifications for each platform.
trans-unit.target: 以平台为中心的工作流程：如果您想专注于为单个平台构建应用程序并且需要能够在较低级别进行修改，请使用此工作流程。例如，如果您希望您的应用将自定义本机组件与基于Web的Cordova组件混合使用，则需要使用此方法，如Embedding WebViews中所述。根据经验，如果需要在SDK中修改项目，请使用此工作流程。此工作流程依赖于为每个受支持平台量身定制的一组较低级的Shell脚本，以及一个允许您应用插件的单独的Plugman实用程序。尽管您可以使用此工作流程来构建跨平台应用程序，但通常会更加困难，因为缺少高级工具意味着每个平台需要单独的构建周期和插件修改。

trans-unit.source: Please Note: When updating the android-versionCode property, it is unwise to increment the version code taken from built apks. Instead, you should increment the code based off the value in your config.xml file's android-versionCode attribute. This is because the cdvBuildMultipleApks property causes the version code to be multiplied by 10 in the built apks and thus using that value will cause your next version code to be 100 times the original, etc.
trans-unit.target: 请注意：更新 android-versionCode 属性时，增加从内置apk中获取的版本代码是不明智的。相反，您应该根据 config.xml 文件的 android-versionCode 属性中的值来递增代码。这是因为 cdvBuildMultipleApks 属性使版本代码在已构建的apk中乘以10，因此使用该值将使您的下一个版本代码为原始版本的100倍，依此类推。

trans-unit.source: PowerShell, for Windows 7 users, must be at version 3.0 or greater for app signing.
trans-unit.target: 对于Windows 7用户，PowerShell必须为3.0或更高版本才能进行应用签名。

trans-unit.source: Privacy Policy: Your app should include a privacy policy that addresses topics such as what kind of information the app collects from or about your users, how that information is used, with whom it is shared, and how users can make privacy-related choices within the app. To aid understanding, you should use plain language and avoid technical jargon. You should make your privacy policy available for users to review prior to download, such as in the app description in the app marketplace. In addition, you should make your privacy policy available within the app itself. The limited size of mobile device displays creates challenges for displaying privacy policies to users. Consider developing a short form of the policy that includes the most important information, and then provide a link to the "long form" policy for those interested in more details. Several groups are attempting to develop icon-based standards for communicating privacy practices, which you may want to consider once these standards mature.
trans-unit.target: 隐私权政策：您的应用程序应包含一个隐私权政策，该主题涉及诸如以下主题：应用程序从用户那里收集或与用户有关的什么样的信息，如何使用该信息，与谁共享该信息以及用户如何在其中进行与隐私相关的选择该应用程序。为了帮助理解，您应该使用通俗易懂的语言并避免使用技术术语。您应该使您的隐私政策可供用户阅读，然后再下载，例如在应用市场中的应用说明中。此外，您应该在应用程序本身中提供隐私政策。移动设备显示器的有限尺寸给向用户显示隐私策略带来了挑战。考虑开发一个简短的表格包含最重要信息的策略，然后为对更多详细信息感兴趣的人提供指向“长格式”策略的链接。几个小组正在尝试开发用于交流隐私惯例的基于图标的标准，一旦这些标准成熟，您可能要考虑这些标准。

trans-unit.source: Simulator may not show expected images when launched from CLI When Xcode deploys to a specific simulator, it only copies the assets that match the simulator's characteristics. For example, if you try to run an app on the iPhone 6s Plus simulator, only @3x launch images are copied. When compiling from the CLI, however, the default is to assume an iPhone 5s, which means only @2x launch images are copied. Unless your launch images are markedly different, chances are good the difference would go unnoticed, but this does mean that the only accurate method of testing is to test on a physical device.
trans-unit.target: 从CLI启动时，模拟器可能不会显示预期的映像。当Xcode部署到特定的模拟器时，它仅复制与模拟器特性匹配的资产。例如，如果尝试在iPhone 6s Plus模拟器上运行应用程序，则仅复制@ 3x启动图像。但是，从CLI进行编译时，默认设置是假设使用iPhone 5s，这意味着仅复制@ 2x启动映像。除非您的启动映像明显不同，否则很有可能不会注意到差异，但这确实意味着唯一准确的测试方法是在物理设备上进行测试。

trans-unit.source: StatusBarBackgroundColor (color hex string, no default value). On iOS, set the background color of the statusbar by a hex string (#RRGGBB) at startup. If this value is not set, the background color will be transparent.
trans-unit.target: StatusBarBackgroundColor（彩色十六进制字符串，无默认值）。在iOS上，启动时通过十六进制字符串（#RRGGBB）设置状态栏的背景颜色。如果未设置此值，则背景色将是透明的。

trans-unit.source: StatusBarDefaultScrollToTop (boolean, defaults to false). On iOS, allows the Cordova WebView to use default scroll-to-top behavior. Defaults to false so you can listen to the "statusTap" event (described below) and customize the behavior instead.
trans-unit.target: StatusBarDefaultScrollToTop（布尔值，默认为false）。在iOS上，允许Cordova WebView使用默认的滚动到顶部行为。默认为false，因此您可以侦听“ statusTap”事件（如下所述）并自定义行为。

trans-unit.source: StatusBarOverlaysWebView (boolean, defaults to true). On iOS, make the statusbar overlay or not overlay the WebView at startup.
trans-unit.target: StatusBarOverlaysWebView（布尔值，默认为true）。在iOS上，在启动时使状态栏覆盖或不覆盖WebView。

trans-unit.source: StatusBarStyle (status bar style, defaults to lightcontent). On iOS, set the status bar style. Available options default, lightcontent, blacktranslucent, blackopaque.
trans-unit.target: StatusBarStyle（状态栏样式，默认为lightcontent）。在iOS上，设置状态栏样式。可用选项默认，光照含量，黑色半透明，黑色不透明。

trans-unit.source: Third party data collection or sharing: If you app collects information that is provided to another company--such as a social networking platform or an ad network (for example, if your app displays advertising)--you should inform your users of that collection and sharing. At a minimum, your privacy policy should describe the information collection and sharing and, if appropriate, offer your users the ability to control or opt-out of such collection or sharing.
trans-unit.target: 第三方数据收集或共享：如果您的应用收集了提供给另一家公司的信息（例如社交网络平台或广告网络）（例如，如果您的应用显示广告），则应将该收集信息告知用户和分享。至少，您的隐私权政策应描述信息的收集和共享，并在适当的情况下为用户提供控制或选择不进行此类收集或共享的能力。

trans-unit.source: WARNING: On Android 4.4 - Android 4.4.3, creating a file input element with type="file" will not open the file picker dialog. This is a regression with Chromium on Android and the problem can be reproduced in the standalone Chrome browser on Android (see http://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=62220) The suggested workaround is to use the FileTransfer and File plugins for Android 4.4. You can listen for an onClick event from the input type="file" and then pop up a file picker UI. In order to tie the form data with the upload, you can use JavaScript to attach form values to the multi-part POST request that FileTransfer makes.
trans-unit.target: 警告：在Android 4.4-Android 4.4.3上，使用type =“ file”创建文件输入元素将不会打开文件选择器对话框。这是Android上Chromium的回归，可以在Android上的独立Chrome浏览器中重现该问题（请参阅http://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=62220）。建议的解决方法是：使用适用于Android 4.4的FileTransfer和File插件。您可以从输入type =“ file”监听onClick事件，然后弹出文件选择器UI。为了将表单数据与上传相关联，您可以使用JavaScript将表单值附加到FileTransfer进行的多部分POST请求中。

trans-unit.source: WARNING: When using the CLI to build your application, you should not edit any files in the /platforms/ directory unless you know what you are doing, or if documentation specifies otherwise. The files in this directory are routinely overwritten when preparing applications for building, or when plugins are re-installed.
trans-unit.target: 警告：使用CLI生成应用程序时，除非您知道自己在做什么或者文档另有规定，否则不应编辑/ platforms /目录中的任何文件。在准备构建应用程序或重新安装插件时，通常会覆盖此目录中的文件。

trans-unit.source: WARNING: Collection and use of geolocation data raises important privacy issues. Your app's privacy policy should discuss how the app uses geolocation data, whether it is shared with any other parties, and the level of precision of the data (for example, coarse, fine, ZIP code level, etc.). Geolocation data is generally considered sensitive because it can reveal user's whereabouts and, if stored, the history of their travels. Therefore, in addition to the app's privacy policy, you should strongly consider providing a just-in-time notice before the app accesses geolocation data (if the device operating system doesn't do so already). That notice should provide the same information noted above, as well as obtaining the user's permission (e.g., by presenting choices for OK and No Thanks). For more information, please see the Privacy Guide.
trans-unit.target: 警告：地理位置数据的收集和使用引发了重要的隐私问题。您的应用程序的隐私权政策应讨论该应用程序如何使用地理位置数据，是否与任何其他方共享，以及数据的精确度（例如，粗略，精细，邮政编码级别等）。地理位置数据通常被认为是敏感的，因为它可以揭示用户的下落以及他们的旅行历史（如果存储了）。因此，除了应用程序的隐私政策外，您还应强烈考虑在应用程序访问地理位置数据之前（如果设备操作系统尚未这样做）提供及时通知。该通知应提供与上述相同的信息，并获得用户的许可（例如，通过选择“ 确定”和“ 不，谢谢”）。有关更多信息，请参阅《隐私指南》。

trans-unit.source: WARNING: Collection and use of images, video, or audio from the device's camera or microphone raises important privacy issues. Your app's privacy policy should discuss how the app uses such sensors and whether the data recorded is shared with any other parties. In addition, if the app's use of the camera or microphone is not apparent in the user interface, you should provide a just-in-time notice before the app accesses the camera or microphone (if the device operating system doesn't do so already). That notice should provide the same information noted above, as well as obtaining the user's permission (e.g., by presenting choices for OK and No Thanks). Note that some app marketplaces may require your app to provide just-in-time notice and obtain permission from the user prior to accessing the camera or microphone. For more information, please see the Privacy Guide.
trans-unit.target: 警告：从设备的相机或麦克风收集和使用图像，视频或音频会引发重要的隐私问题。您的应用程序的隐私权政策应讨论该应用程序如何使用此类传感器以及是否与任何其他方共享记录的数据。此外，如果在用户界面中看不到应用程序对相机或麦克风的使用，则应在应用程序访问相机或麦克风之前提供及时通知（如果设备操作系统尚未这样做） ）。该通知应提供与上述相同的信息，并获得用户的许可（例如，通过选择“ 确定”和“ 不，谢谢”）。请注意，某些应用程序市场可能会要求您的应用程序在访问相机或麦克风之前提供及时通知并获得用户的许可。有关更多信息，请参见隐私指南。

trans-unit.target: 警告：Android实施过于贪婪，长时间使用会耗尽设备的电池电量。

trans-unit.source: suppressesIncrementalRendering: Set to yes or no to wait until all new view content is received before being rendered (defaults to no). Only applicable to UIWebView (usewkwebview=no).
trans-unit.target: inhibitorsIncrementalRendering：设置为 yes 或 no ，直到在接收到所有新视图内容之后才进行渲染（默认为 no ）。仅适用于UIWebView（ usewkwebview=no ）。

trans-unit.target: 时间：最长时间是5000ms（5s），最短时间是1ms

trans-unit.source: timeout: The maximum length of time (milliseconds) that is allowed to pass from the call to navigator.geolocation.getCurrentPosition or geolocation.watchPosition until the corresponding geolocationSuccess callback executes. If the geolocationSuccess callback is not invoked within this time, the geolocationError callback is passed a PositionError.TIMEOUT error code. (Note that when used in conjunction with geolocation.watchPosition, the geolocationError callback could be called on an interval every timeout milliseconds!) (Number)
trans-unit.target: timeout：从调用传递到 navigator.geolocation.getCurrentPosition 或 geolocation.watchPosition 的最大时间长度（毫秒），直到执行相应的 geolocationSuccess 回调为止。如果 geolocationSuccess 回调时间内没有被调用， geolocationError 回调传递一个 PositionError.TIMEOUT 错误代码。 （请注意，当与 geolocation.watchPosition 结合使用时，可以在每个 timeout 毫秒的时间间隔内调用 geolocationError 回调！）（数字）

trans-unit.source: times: The number of times to repeat the beep. (Number)

trans-unit.source: useWideViewPort: Sets whether the WebView should enable support for the "viewport" HTML meta tag or should use a wide viewport. When the value of the setting is no, the layout width is always set to the width of the WebView control in device-independent (CSS) pixels. When the value is yes and the page contains the viewport meta tag, the value of the width specified in the tag is used. If the page does not contain the tag or does not provide a width, then a wide viewport will be used. (defaults to yes).
trans-unit.target: useWideViewPort：设置WebView是应启用对“视口” HTML元标记的支持还是应使用宽视口。当设置的值为 no 时，布局宽度始终设置为WebView控件的宽度，以设备无关（CSS）像素为单位。当值为 yes 且页面包含视口元标记时，将使用标记中指定的宽度值。如果页面不包含标签或不提供宽度，则将使用宽视口。 （默认为 yes ）。

trans-unit.source: usewkwebview: set to yes to use WKWebView engine for the InappBrowser. Omit or set to no (default) to use UIWebView. Note: Using usewkwebview=yes requires that a WKWebView engine plugin be installed in the Cordova project (e.g. cordova-plugin-wkwebview-engine or cordova-plugin-ionic-webview).
trans-unit.target: usewkwebview：设置为 yes 可以为InappBrowser使用WKWebView引擎。省略或设置为 no （默认）以使用UIWebView。注意：使用 usewkwebview=yes 要求在Cordova项目中安装WKWebView引擎插件（例如cordova-plugin-wkwebview-engine或cordova-plugin-ionic-webview）。

trans-unit.source: A plugin exposes a Javascript API for native SDK functionality. Plugins are typically hosted on npm and you can search for them on the plugin search page. Some key APIs are provided by the Apache Cordova open source project and these are referred to as Core Plugin APIs. You can also use the CLI to launch the search page:
trans-unit.target: 一个插件公开的原生SDK功能的JavaScript API版本。插件通常托管在npm上，您可以在插件搜索页面上进行搜索。 Apache Cordova开源项目提供了一些关键API，这些关键API被称为Core Plugin API。您还可以使用CLI启动搜索页面：

trans-unit.source: A plugin is a package of injected code that allows the Cordova webview within which the app renders to communicate with the native platform on which it runs. Plugins provide access to device and platform functionality that is ordinarily unavailable to web-based apps. All the main Cordova API features are implemented as plugins, and many others are available that enable features such as bar code scanners, NFC communication, or to tailor calendar interfaces. You can search for available plugins on Cordova Plugin Search page.
trans-unit.target: 甲插件是一个包的注入的代码，其允许web视图科尔多瓦在其内的应用程序呈现与在其上运行的本地平台进行通信。插件提供对基于Web的应用程序通常不可用的设备和平台功能的访问。Cordova API的所有主要功能都是作为插件实现的，还有许多其他功能可启用诸如条形码扫描器，NFC通信或定制日历界面之类的功能。您可以在Cordova插件搜索页面上搜索可用的插件。

trans-unit.target: Cordova平台： "cordova-android" ， "cordova-ios" ， "cordova-windows" 等。

trans-unit.source: A timed prompt asking the user to opt-in or out is displayed the first time cordova is run. It lasts for 30 seconds, after which the user is automatically opted-out if he doesn't provide any answer. In CI environments, the CI environment variable can be set, which will prevent the prompt from showing up. Telemetry collection can also be turned off on a single command by using the --no-telemetry flag.
trans-unit.target: 第一次运行cordova时，会显示要求用户选择加入或退出的定时提示。持续30秒钟，此后如果用户未提供任何答案，则会自动退出用户。在CI环境中，可以设置 CI 环境变量，这将防止出现提示。也可以使用 --no-telemetry 标志在单个命令上关闭遥测收集。

trans-unit.source: Added in cordova-android 3.7.0, This preference sets which volume the hardware volume buttons link to. By default this is "call" for phones and "media" for tablets. Set this to "media" to have your app's volume buttons always change the media volume. Note that when using Cordova's media plugin, the volume buttons will dynamically change to controlling the media volume when any Media objects are active.
trans-unit.target: 在cordova-android 3.7.0中添加,这个参数设置硬件音量按钮链接到哪个音量.默认情况下,手机为 "通话",平板电脑为 "媒体"。将此设置为 "媒体",让你的应用程序的音量按钮总是改变媒体音量。请注意,当使用Cordova的媒体插件时,当任何媒体对象处于活动状态时,音量按钮将动态改变为控制媒体音量。

trans-unit.source: All plugin versions below the lowest entry (1.0.0 in this example) are assumed to have no dependencies. Any version of the plugin between 1.0.0 and 2.1.0 is assumed to have the same dependencies as version 1.0.0 (a cordova-android version less than 3.0.0). This lets you only update your cordovaDependencies information when there are breaking changes.

trans-unit.source: Allowed within <js-module> element. It implies that your code should be specified with cordova.require, but not installed on the window object. This is useful when initializing the module, attaching event handlers or otherwise. You can only have up to one <runs/> tag. Note that including a <runs/> with <clobbers/> or <merges/> is redundant, since they also cordova.require your module.
trans-unit.target: 在 <js-module> 元素中允许。这意味着您的代码应使用 cordova.require 指定，但不要安装在 window 对象上。这在初始化模块，附加事件处理程序或其他方式时很有用。您最多只能有一个 <runs/> 标记。需要注意的是，包括 <runs/> 与 <clobbers/> 或 <merges/> ，是多余的，因为它们还 cordova.require 你的模块。

trans-unit.source: Allowed within <js-module> element. Used to specify the namespace under window object where module.exports gets inserted. You can have as many <clobbers> as you like. Any object not available on window is created.
trans-unit.target: 在 <js-module> 元素中允许。用于指定在其中插入module.exports的 window 对象下的名称空间。您可以根据需要拥有 <clobbers> 多个<clobbers>。创建 window 上不可用的任何对象。

trans-unit.source: Allowed within <js-module> element. Used to specify the namespace under window object where module.exports gets merged with any existing value. If any key already exists, the module's version overrides the original. You can have as many <merges> as you like. Any object not available on window is created.
trans-unit.target: 在 <js-module> 元素中允许。用于在 window 对象下指定module.exports与任何现有值合并的命名空间。如果已经存在任何密钥，则模块的版本将覆盖原始密钥。您可以根据需要拥有任意多个 <merges> 。创建 window 上不可用的任何对象。

trans-unit.target: 尽管 window.open 在全局范围内，但是InAppBrowser直到 deviceready 事件之后才可用。

trans-unit.source: Although Cordova makes cross-platform development easier, it's just not possible to provide 100% isolation from the underlying native platform, so do be aware of restrictions.
trans-unit.target: 虽然Cordova让跨平台开发变得更容易,但就是无法提供与底层原生平台100%隔离的功能,所以要注意限制。

trans-unit.source: Although in the global scope, it is not available until after the deviceready event.
trans-unit.target: 尽管在全局范围内，但只有在 deviceready 事件之后才可用。

trans-unit.source: Although in the global scope, they are not available until after the deviceready event.
trans-unit.target: 尽管它们在全局范围内，但是直到 deviceready 事件之后才可用。

trans-unit.source: Although it is not recommended, it is also possible to define icons using the width and height attributes:
trans-unit.target: 尽管不建议这样做，但也可以使用 width 和 height 属性定义图标：

trans-unit.source: Although it would be nice to be able to test only on one device per platform, it is best to test on many devices sporting many different OS versions. For example, what works on your particular Android smartphone may fail on another Android device. What works on the latest iOS device may fail on an older one.
trans-unit.target: 虽然能够在每个平台的一个设备上进行测试会很好,但最好是在许多不同操作系统版本的设备上进行测试。例如,在您的特定Android智能手机上工作的东西可能会在另一台Android设备上失效。在最新的iOS设备上工作的东西可能会在旧设备上失效。

trans-unit.source: Although technically an implementation detail, it can be very useful to know how the cordova.file.* properties map to physical paths on a real device.
trans-unit.target: 尽管从技术上讲是实现细节，但是了解 cordova.file.* 属性如何映射到真实设备上的物理路径可能非常有用。

trans-unit.source: Although the object is attached to the global scoped navigator, it is not available until after the deviceready event.
trans-unit.target: 尽管对象已附加到全局作用域 navigator ，但直到 deviceready 事件之后该对象才可用。

trans-unit.source: Although the object is in the global scope, features provided by this plugin are not available until after the deviceready event.
trans-unit.target: 尽管对象在全局范围内，但此插件提供的功能只有在 deviceready 事件之后才可用。

trans-unit.source: Always test your apps to ensure that installing the new plugin has not broken something that you did not anticipate.
trans-unit.target: 总是测试你的应用程序,以确保安装新插件没有破坏你没有预料到的东西。

trans-unit.source: Always validate any and all input that your application accepts. This includes usernames, passwords, dates, uploaded media, etc. Because an attacker could manipulate your HTML and JS assets (either by decompiling your application or using debugging tools like chrome://inspect), this validation should also be performed on your server, especially before handing the data off to any backend service.
trans-unit.target: 始终验证您的应用程序接受的任何和所有输入。这包括用户名、密码、日期、上传的媒体等。因为攻击者可以操纵你的HTML和JS资产(通过反编译你的应用程序或使用像chrome://inspect这样的调试工具),这种验证也应该在你的服务器上执行,特别是在将数据交给任何后端服务之前。

trans-unit.source: An XPath selector referencing the parent of the elements to be added to the config file. If you use absolute selectors, you can use a wildcard (*) to specify the root element, e.g., /*/plugins. If the selector does not resolve to a child of the specified document, the tool stops and reverses the installation process, issues a warning, and exits with a non-zero code.
trans-unit.target: XPath选择器，引用要添加到配置文件中的元素的父级。如果使用绝对选择器，则可以使用通配符（ * ）指定根元素，例如 /*/plugins 。如果选择器不能解析为指定文档的子级，则该工具将停止并逆向安装过程，发出警告，并以非零代码退出。

trans-unit.source: An XPath selector referencing the target element to make attribute modifications to. If you use absolute selectors, you can use a wildcard (*) to specify the root element, e.g., /*/plugins. If the selector does not resolve to a child of the specified document, the tool stops and reverses the installation process, issues a warning, and exits with a non-zero code.
trans-unit.target: 引用目标元素以对其进行属性修改的XPath选择器。如果使用绝对选择器，则可以使用通配符（ * ）指定根元素，例如 /*/plugins 。如果选择器不能解析为指定文档的子级，则该工具将停止并逆向安装过程，发出警告，并以非零代码退出。

trans-unit.source: An iOS plugin is implemented as an Objective-C class that extends the CDVPlugin class. For JavaScript's exec method's service parameter to map to an Objective-C class, each plugin class must be registered as a <feature> tag in the named application directory's config.xml file.
trans-unit.target: iOS插件被实现为扩展 CDVPlugin 类的Objective-C 类。为了使JavaScript的 exec 方法的 service 参数映射到Objective-C类，每个插件类必须在命名的应用程序目录的 config.xml 文件中注册为 <feature> 标记。

trans-unit.source: And many, many, more.
trans-unit.target: 还有很多,很多,更多。

trans-unit.source: And that's it, we have an end to end C++ backed js callable plugin for use in Apache Cordova Windows!
trans-unit.target: 就这样,我们有了一个端到端C++支持的js可调用插件,可以在Apache Cordova Windows中使用。

trans-unit.source: Android debugging can be done with either Eclipse or Android Studio, although Android studio is recommended. Since Cordova-Android is currently used as a library project, and plugins are supported as source code, it is possible to debug the Java code inside a Cordova application just like a native Android application.
trans-unit.target: Android调试可以用Eclipse或Android Studio来完成,不过推荐使用Android studio。由于目前Cordova-Android是作为一个库项目使用的,而且插件作为源代码也是支持的,所以可以像原生Android应用一样在Cordova应用里面调试Java代码。

trans-unit.source: Android devices record audio in AAC ADTS file format. The specified file should end with a .aac extension.
trans-unit.target: Android设备以AAC ADTS文件格式记录音频。指定的文件应以.aac扩展名结尾。

trans-unit.source: Android features an Intent system that allows processes to communicate with each other. Plugins have access to a CordovaInterface object, which can access the Android Activity that runs the application. This is the Context required to launch a new Android Intent. The CordovaInterface allows plugins to start an Activity for a result, and to set the callback plugin for when the Intent returns to the application.
trans-unit.target: Android具有Intent系统，该系统允许进程相互通信。插件可以访问 CordovaInterface 对象，该对象可以访问运行该应用程序的Android Activity。这是启动新的Android Intent所需的上下文。该 CordovaInterface 允许使用插件来启动一个活动的结果，并设置当回调插件意图返回给应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Android icon guide
trans-unit.target: 安卓图标指南

trans-unit.source: Android permissions until recently have been handled at install-time instead of runtime. These permissions are required to be declared on an application that uses the permissions, and these permissions need to be added to the Android Manifest. This can be accomplished by using the config.xml to inject these permissions in the AndroidManifest.xml file. The example below uses the Contacts permission.
trans-unit.target: 直到最近，Android权限才在安装时而非运行时处理。必须在使用这些权限的应用程序上声明这些权限，并且需要将这些权限添加到Android清单中。这可以通过使用 config.xml 在 AndroidManifest.xml 文件中注入这些权限来实现。下面的示例使用“联系人”权限。

trans-unit.source: Android plugins are based on Cordova-Android, which is built from an Android WebView with a native bridge. The native portion of an Android plugin consists of at least one Java class that extends the CordovaPlugin class and overrides one of its execute methods.
trans-unit.target: Android插件基于Cordova-Android，它是通过具有本机桥的Android WebView构建的。Android插件的本机部分至少包含一个Java类，该类扩展了 CordovaPlugin 类并覆盖其 execute 方法之一。

trans-unit.source: Android provides a developer setting for debugging Activity destruction on low memory. Enable the "Don't keep activities" setting in the Developer Options menu on your device or emulator to simulate low memory scenarios. If your plugin launches external activities, you should always do some testing with this setting enabled to ensure that you are properly handling low memory scenarios.
trans-unit.target: Android提供了一个开发者设置,用于调试低内存下的Activity破坏。在设备或模拟器上的开发者选项菜单中启用 "不要保留活动 "设置,以模拟低内存场景。如果你的插件启动了外部活动,你应该始终在启用该设置的情况下做一些测试,以确保你正确处理低内存场景。

trans-unit.source: Android provides a developer setting for testing Activity destruction on low memory. Enable the "Don't keep activities" setting in the Developer Options menu on your device or emulator to simulate low memory scenarios. You should always do some amount of testing with this setting enabled to make sure that your application is properly maintaining state.
trans-unit.target: Android提供了一个开发者设置,用于测试低内存下的Activity销毁。在设备或模拟器上的开发者选项菜单中启用 "不要保留活动 "设置,以模拟低内存场景。你应该始终在启用该设置的情况下进行一定量的测试,以确保你的应用程序正确地保持状态。

trans-unit.source: Android supports a maximum of three buttons, and ignores any more than that.
trans-unit.target: 安卓系统最多支持三个按钮,超过的按钮就会被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Android supports an additional quality property, to allow capturing video at different qualities. A value of 1 ( the default ) means high quality and value of 0 means low quality, suitable for MMS messages. See here for more details.
trans-unit.target: Android支持附加的quality属性，以允许捕获不同质量的视频。值 1 （默认值）表示高质量，值 0 表示低质量，适用于MMS消息。有关更多详细信息，请参见此处。

trans-unit.source: Android supports these additional options:
trans-unit.target: Android支持这些附加选项。

trans-unit.source: Android uses intents to launch the camera activity on the device to capture images, and on phones with low memory, the Cordova activity may be killed. In this scenario, the result from the plugin call will be delivered via the resume event. See the Android Lifecycle guide for more information. The pendingResult.result value will contain the value that would be passed to the callbacks (either the URI/URL or an error message). Check the pendingResult.pluginStatus to determine whether or not the call was successful.
trans-unit.target: Android使用意图在设备上启动相机活动以捕获图像，而在内存不足的手机上，Cordova活动可能会被杀死。在这种情况下，插件调用的结果将通过resume事件传递。有关更多信息，请参见Android Lifecycle指南。该 pendingResult.result 值将包含将被传递到回调（无论是URI / URL或错误消息）的值。检查 pendingResult.pluginStatus 以确定调用是否成功。

trans-unit.source: Apache Cordova
trans-unit.target: 阿帕奇科尔多瓦

trans-unit.source: Apache Cordova is an open-source mobile development framework. It allows you to use standard web technologies - HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript for cross-platform development. Applications execute within wrappers targeted to each platform, and rely on standards-compliant API bindings to access each device's capabilities such as sensors, data, network status, etc.
trans-unit.target: Apache Cordova是一个开放源码的移动开发框架,它允许你使用标准的Web技术--HTML5、CSS3和JavaScript进行跨平台开发。它允许你使用标准的Web技术--HTML5、CSS3和JavaScript进行跨平台开发。应用程序在针对每个平台的包装器中执行,并依靠符合标准的API绑定来访问每个设备的功能,如传感器、数据、网络状态等。

trans-unit.source: Apache Cordova project maintains a set of plugins called the Core Plugins. These core plugins provide your application to access device capabilities such as battery, camera, contacts, etc.
trans-unit.target: Apache Cordova项目维护着一组称为Core Plugins的插件。这些核心插件为您的应用程序提供了访问设备功能的能力，例如电池，相机，联系人等。

trans-unit.source: App compatibility is determined by the OS that the app targeted. Apps are forwardly-compatible but not backwardly-compatible, so an app targeting Windows 10 cannot run on 8.1, but an app built for 8.1 can run on 10.
trans-unit.target: 应用的兼容性是由应用所针对的操作系统决定的。应用是向前兼容的,但不是向后兼容的,所以针对Windows 10的应用不能在8.1上运行,但为8.1打造的应用可以在10上运行。

trans-unit.source: Apple is moving away from legacy launch images. There is no official support for providing a native-resolution launch image for the iPad Pro 12.9 or for providing launch images that work with split-screen multitasking or slide-over. If your app doesn't need to support these contexts, then you can continue to use legacy launch images for as long as you like.
trans-unit.target: 苹果正在远离传统的启动图片。目前官方并不支持为 iPad Pro 12.9 提供原生分辨率的启动图像,也不支持提供与分屏多任务或滑盖配合的启动图像。如果你的应用不需要支持这些情境,那么只要你愿意,你可以继续使用传统的启动图像。

trans-unit.source: Apple® tools required to build OS X applications run only on the OS X operating system on Intel-based Macs. Xcode® 6.0 (the minimum required version) runs only on OS X version 10.9 (Mavericks) or greater, and includes the OS X SDK (Software Development Kit). To submit apps to the Apple App Store℠ requires the latest versions of the Apple tools.
trans-unit.target: 构建OS X应用程序所需的Apple®工具仅在基于Intel的Mac上的OS X操作系统上运行。Xcode®6.0（最低要求的版本）仅可在OS X版本10.9（Mavericks）或更高版本上运行，并包括OS X SDK（软件开发套件）。要将应用程序提交到Apple AppStore℠，需要使用最新版本的Apple工具。

trans-unit.source: Apple® tools required to build iOS applications only run on the OS X operating system on Intel-based Macs. Xcode® 8.0 (the minimum required version) runs only on OS X version 10.11.5 (El Capitan) or greater, and includes the iOS 10 SDK (Software Development Kit). To submit apps to the Apple App Store℠ requires the latest versions of the Apple tools.
trans-unit.target: 构建iOS应用程序所需的Apple®工具只能在基于Intel的Mac上的OS X操作系统上运行。Xcode®8.0（最低要求版本）仅可在OS X 10.11.5版（El Capitan）或更高版本上运行，并包括iOS 10 SDK（软件开发套件）。要将应用程序提交到Apple AppStore℠，需要使用最新版本的Apple工具。

trans-unit.source: As of cordova-android@4.0.0, Cordova for Android projects are built using Gradle. For instructions on building with Ant, refer to older versions of the documentation. Please note that Ant builds are deprecated as of the Android SDK Tools 25.3.0.

trans-unit.source: As of Cordova 2.0, Plugins can no longer directly access the Context, and the legacy ctx member is deprecated. All ctx methods exist on the Context, so both getContext() and getActivity() can return the required object.
trans-unit.target: 从Cordova 2.0开始，插件不再可以直接访问Context，并且不建议使用旧版 ctx 成员。所有 ctx 方法都存在于Context上，因此 getContext() 和 getActivity() 都可以返回所需的对象。

trans-unit.source: As of Cordova 2.1.0, CordovaLib has been upgraded to use Automatic Reference Counting (ARC). You don't need to upgrade to ARC to use CordovaLib, but if you want to upgrade your project to use ARC, you should use the Xcode migration wizard from the Edit → Refactor → Convert to Objective-C ARC... menu, de-select libCordova.a, then run the wizard to completion.
trans-unit.target: 从Cordova 2.1.0开始， CordovaLib 已升级为使用自动引用计数（ARC）。你并不需要升级到ARC使用 CordovaLib ，但如果你想升级你的项目中使用ARC，你应该使用Xcode的迁移向导从编辑→重构→转换为Objective-C的ARC ...菜单，德-选择libCordova.a，然后运行向导以完成操作。

trans-unit.source: As seen in the previous section, sometimes plugin might require user to specify values for their variables. To make those variable mandatory, the <platform> tag needs to contain a <preference> tag. The CLI checks that these required preferences are passed in. If not, it should warn the user how to pass the variable in and exit with a non-zero code. Preferences can be referenced elsewhere in plugin.xml using the syntax $PREFERENCE_NAME.
trans-unit.target: 如上一节所述，有时插件可能会要求用户为其变量指定值。要使这些变量为必需变量， <platform> 标记需要包含一个 <preference> 标记。CLI检查是否传入了这些必需的首选项。如果没有，它将警告用户如何传入变量并以非零代码退出。可以使用 $PREFERENCE_NAME 语法在 plugin.xml 中的其他位置引用首选项。

trans-unit.source: As the previous setting, CordovaWebViewEngine, this enables you to override the default fallback WebView with a different plugin. The default WebView uses a private plugin, CDVUIWebViewEngine. You can override this if you need to use a public plugin instead. A use case for this setting is where you need to use something other than the default CDVUIWebViewEngine to render the host app. If CordovaDefaultWebViewEngine and CordovaWebViewEngine is set, CordovaWebViewEngine will be chosen to render the host app for devices running iOS9 and above, while CordovaDefaultWebViewEngine will be the fallback for iOS8. The plugin must conform to the CDVWebViewEngineProtocol protocol. The 'value' here should match the 'feature' name of the WebView engine plugin that is installed.
trans-unit.target: 和前面的设置一样,CordovaWebViewEngine,这可以让你用不同的插件覆盖默认的后备WebView。默认的WebView使用的是一个私有插件,CDVUIWebViewEngine。如果您需要使用公共插件,您可以覆盖它。此设置的一个用例是,您需要使用默认的CDVUIWebViewEngine以外的东西来渲染主机应用程序。如果设置了CordovaDefaultWebViewEngine和CordovaWebViewEngine,对于运行iOS9及以上的设备,将选择CordovaWebViewEngine来渲染主机应用,而CordovaDefaultWebViewEngine将是iOS8的后备。该插件必须符合CDVWebViewEngineProtocol协议。这里的 "值 "应该与安装的WebView引擎插件的 "特征 "名称相匹配。

trans-unit.source: Be aware that some websites may automatically redirect from their home page to a different url, such as using https protocol or to a country-specific domain. For example http://www.google.com will redirect to use SSL/TLS at https://www.google.com, and then may further redirect to a geography such as https://www.google.co.uk. Such scenarios may require modified or additional whitelist entries beyond your initial requirement. Please consider this as you are building your whitelist.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，某些网站可能会自动从其首页重定向到其他URL，例如使用https协议或特定国​​家/地区的域名。例如， http://www.google.com 将重定向到 https://www.google.com 上以使用SSL / TLS ，然后可以进一步重定向到诸如 https://www.google.co.uk 的地理位置。此类情况可能需要超出您的初始要求的修改或其他白名单条目。在建立白名单时，请考虑这一点。

trans-unit.source: Be sure to check the updated plugin's documentation, as you may need to adjust your code to work with the new version. Also, double check that the new version of the plugin works with your project's version of Cordova.
trans-unit.target: 一定要检查更新后的插件文档,因为你可能需要调整你的代码以适应新版本。另外,请仔细检查新版本的插件是否与你的项目的Cordova版本兼容。

trans-unit.source: Be sure to communicate how the Cordova application should interpret the result they receive in the resume event. It is up to the Cordova application to maintain their own state and remember what requests they made and what arguments they provided if necessary. However, you should still clearly communicate the meaning of pluginStatus values and what sort of data is being returned in the resume field as part of your plugin's API.
trans-unit.target: 确保传达Cordova应用程序应如何解释他们在 resume 事件中收到的结果。由Cordova应用程序维护自己的状态，并记住它们发出的请求以及必要时提供的参数。但是，您仍然应该清楚地传达 pluginStatus 值的含义，以及作为您的插件API的一部分在 resume 字段中返回的数据类型。

trans-unit.source: Before you can take a picture, you need to set some Camera plugin options to pass into the Camera plugin's getPicture function. Here is a common set of recommendations. In this example, you create the object that you will use for the Camera options, and set the sourceType dynamically to support both the Camera app and the file picker.
trans-unit.target: 在拍照之前，您需要设置一些Camera插件选项以传递到Camera插件的 getPicture 函数中。这是一组常见的建议。在此示例中，您将创建用于“相机”选项的对象，并动态设置 sourceType 以同时支持“相机”应用程序和文件选择器。

trans-unit.source: Before you can use Plugman, you must create a Cordova project. You can do this with either the Command-line Interface or with the lower level shell scripts. Instructions for using the shell scripts to create your project are located in the various "Command-line Tools" guides listed on the Platform guides page.
trans-unit.target: 在您使用Plugman之前,您必须创建一个Cordova项目。您可以通过命令行界面或低级别的shell脚本来完成。使用 shell 脚本创建项目的说明位于平台指南页面上列出的各种 "命令行工具 "指南中。

trans-unit.source: Before you get the file, get a FileSystem reference using requestFileSystem. By passing window.TEMPORARY in the method call (same as before), the returned FileSystem object (fs) represents the cache in the sandboxed file system. Use fs.root to get the DirectoryEntry object that you need.
trans-unit.target: 在获取文件之前，请使用 requestFileSystem 获取FileSystem参考。通过在方法调用中传递window.TEMPORARY（与之前相同），返回的FileSystem对象（fs）表示沙盒文件系统中的缓存。使用 fs.root 获取所需的DirectoryEntry对象。

trans-unit.source: Before you use the File plugin APIs, you can get access to the file system using requestFileSystem. When you do this, you can request either persistent or temporary storage. Persistent storage will not be removed unless permission is granted by the user.
trans-unit.target: 在使用文件插件API之前，您可以使用 requestFileSystem 来访问文件系统。执行此操作时，您可以请求持久性存储或临时存储。除非用户授予许可，否则不会删除永久性存储。

trans-unit.source: Begin by creating a cordova app that will become the basis for your template. Then you'll take the contents of your app and put them into the following structure. When your template is used, all of the contents within template_src will be used to create the new project, so be sure to include any necessary files in that folder. Reference this example for details.
trans-unit.target: 首先创建一个cordova应用程序，它将成为您模板的基础。然后，您将获取应用程序的内容，并将其放入以下结构中。当使用模板，所有的内内容 template_src 将用于创建新的项目，所以一定要包括该文件夹中的任何必要的文件。有关详细信息，请参考此示例。

trans-unit.source: Below is a brief example application that uses the resume and pause events to manage state. It uses the Apache camera plugin as an example of how to retrieve the results of a plugin call from the resume event payload. trans-unit.target: 以下是使用 resume 和 pause 事件来管理状态的简短示例应用程序。它以Apache相机插件为例，说明了如何从 resume 事件有效负载中检索插件调用的结果。处理 resume 的 event.pendingResult 对象的代码部分需要cordova-android 5.1.0+
